about_the_game:
Twinkle War is a strategy chess game adapted from the science fiction era. Players will play the role of a young military academy student, interact with a series of beautiful girls, and embark on a life of their own academy commander. They will participate in military exercises on a small island with surging undercurrents to increase their strength and write their own heroic stories.

The form of strategic chess with unique charm, commanding a large number of mechanical forces such as tanks, planes, and other various units, as well as high-tech technologies such as Iron Curtain and nuclear bombs, to experience a war scene with a sense of the times.

Train the combat troops under their command and equip them with various tactical skills to defeat the powerful enemy elite.



Okay, the above is a copy. There are many shortcomings in the game, please make sure to purchase it at a very low price and refund it in a timely manner. The game will probably update its content irregularly, and everything will go according to the situation.

Players will play the role of a young military academy student, interact with a series of beautiful girls, and embark on a life of their own academy commander.
